data.title: Julia Roberts News, Pictures, and Videos
data.meta_description: Get the latest and most updated news, videos, and photo galleries about Julia Roberts
data.text:
Emma Roberts Says She Lost Jobs Because of Her Famous Relatives

Emma Roberts, who is Julia Roberts’ niece, weighed in on the nepotism debate, saying her famous family has harmed her career.

Proof Julia Roberts and Danny Moder Are Closer Than Ever After 22 Years of Marriage

Julia Roberts and Danny Moder celebrated their 22nd anniversary on the Fourth of July. See the actress' tribute to her husband.

Nikki Glaser's Parents Apologize for "Gross" Comments About Julia Roberts & Travis Kelce at Eras Tour

Nikki Glaser's parents issued an apology after saying that Julia Roberts was "gross" while meeting Travis Kelce at Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour.

Travis Kelce Joined by Julia Roberts at Taylor Swift's Third Dublin Eras Tour Show

Travis Kelce was spotted hanging out with Julia Roberts at a VIP tent at his girlfriend Taylor Swift's third Eras tour concert in Dublin.

Julia Roberts Wishes Son Henry a Happy 17th Birthday with Rare Throwback Baby Photo

Julia Roberts, who shares 19-year-old twins Phinneas and Hazel with husband Danny Moder, posts a sweet birthday tribute in honor of their son Henry's 17th birthday.

Julia Roberts' Rare Photo of Son Henry Will Warm Your Heart Indefinitely

Julia Roberts—who shares 19-year-old twins Phinneas and Hazel with husband Danny Moder—posted a sweet birthday tribute in honor of their son Henry's 17th birthday.

You Won't Runaway From Richard Gere's Glowing First Impression of Julia Roberts

In an exclusive E! News interview at the Cannes Film Festival, Richard Gere explained his first impression of Julia Roberts ahead of working together on Pretty Woman.

The Most Charming Notting Hill Secrets You Could Imagine Are Behind This Blue Door

It's been 25 years since Julia Roberts was just a girl, standing in front of Hugh Grant, asking him to love her in Notting Hill.

Megan Fox, Nicholas Galitzine and More Whose First Jobs Are Relatable AF

Megan Fox and Nicholas Galitzine are just a couple of stars who once served frosty treats to get by—and never forget that the person who just handed you a bucket of chicken might win an Oscar one day.

Julia Roberts GUSHES Over Husband Danny Moder For His Birthday

'Leave the World Behind' actress Julia Roberts celebrates her husband of 21 years, Danny Moder, on his 55th birthday by posting a romantic photo.

Julia Roberts’ Secret To Staying Youthful Will Surprise You!

The actress tells ‘British Vogue’ in a new interview that “the love of a good man,” aka husband Danny Moder, has helped her stay youthful.

Julia Roberts Shares Sweet Glimpse Into Relationship With Husband Danny Moder

Julia Roberts opens up about relationship with husband Danny Moder, saying he "loves me and cares for me in a way that makes me feel deeply, deeply happy."

Julia Roberts Reveals the GRIM Fate of Pretty Woman's Edward

Julia Roberts shares her predictions for her most beloved characters from films like 'Pretty Woman,' 'Runaway Bride,' 'Mystic Pizza’ and more.

Julia Roberts Reveals the Grim Fate of Pretty Woman's Edward

Julia Roberts shared her predictions for her most beloved characters from films like Pretty Woman, Runaway Bride, Mystic Pizza and more.

RHOBH's Sutton Stracke Breaks Silence on Julia Roberts' Viral "Name 'Em" Reenactment

The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' Sutton Stracke reacted to Oscar winner Julia Roberts impersonating her viral "name 'em" scene from the Bravo series. Find out her epic response.

Sutton Stracke Reacts To Julia Robert's Impersonation

‘Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ Sutton Stracke sat down with E!’s Justin Sylvester and Courtney Lopez to talk about Kyle Richard’s Dinner and more.
